text: is a Japanese band. Their album Santa Fe reached the 19th place on the Weekly Oricon Albums Chart and their singles "For You" and "Oh Yeah!!!!!!!" reached the 24th place on the Weekly Oricon Singles Chart. "Oh Yeah!!!!!!!" was also the third ending song for the second season of the Dragon Ball Kai anime television series. Their single "Forever Dreaming" is the fourth ending theme for Dragon Ball Super. ==Discography== ===Albums=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Albums Chart. !Ref. |- |October 5, 2011 |Maminka |125 | |- |June 6, 2012 |Dinosaur (stylized as DINOSAUR) |100 | |- |October 30, 2013 |Neverland (stylized as NEVERLAND) |31 | |- |July 16, 2014 |Mantle (stylized as MANTLE) |26 | |- |September 9, 2015 |Santa Fe |19 | |- |July 20, 2016 |Dreams (stylized as DREAMS) |27 | |- |March 14, 2018 | |unknown | |} ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart. !Ref. |- |June 8, 2011 |"Casually" |114 | |- |November 7, 2012 |"Ivory" (stylized as "IVORY") |94 | |- | June 26, 2013 | "Festival" | — | |- |November 12, 2014 |"Oh Yeah!!!!!!!" |24 | |- |February 4, 2015 |"For You" |24 | |- |May 18, 2016 |"Forever Dreaming" |37 | |- |September 27, 2017 | (Czecho No Republic × Sky-Hi) |unknown | |} ==DVDs== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align: center" !Release date !Title !OriconPeak ranking on the weekly Oricon DVD Chart. !Ref. |- |March 30, 2016 |Naka to Soto (stylized as NAKA TO SOTO) |44 | |} ==Notes== ==References== == External links == * * Category:2010 establishments in Japan Category:Japanese pop rock music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2010 Category:Musical groups from Tokyo Category:Nippon Columbia artists
